import React, {useState} from 'react' export const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' }) const {name, email, password, password2} = user; const onChange = e => setUser({...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log('Register Submit') } return (
